conditions.name: COVID-19
conditions.suggestion: URGENT: Isolate immediately! Common tablets: Paxlovid (Nirmatrelvir 300mg + Ritonavir 100mg) if prescribed within 5 days of symptoms. For symptoms: Acetaminophen (500mg every 6 hours). CRITICAL: Monitor oxygen levels. ALERT: Seek emergency care if breathing difficulty occurs. Take Vitamin D (1000-2000 IU) and Zinc (50mg) for immune support.

conditions.name: Influenza
conditions.suggestion: IMPORTANT: Start treatment within 48 hours. Common tablets: Oseltamivir (Tamiflu 75mg twice daily for 5 days), Acetaminophen (500mg) or Ibuprofen (400mg) for fever/pain. ALERT: Rest essential. WARNING: Return of high fever may indicate complications.

conditions.name: Tuberculosis
conditions.suggestion: CRITICAL: Complete FULL course of treatment. Common tablets: Isoniazid (300mg) + Rifampin (600mg) + Pyrazinamide (1500mg) + Ethambutol (1200mg) daily. MUST take Vitamin B6 (25mg) to prevent side effects. WARNING: Missing doses can lead to drug resistance. Isolation required until cleared by doctor.

conditions.name: Lyme Disease
conditions.suggestion: URGENT: Early treatment crucial. Common tablets: Doxycycline (100mg twice daily for 10-21 days), Amoxicillin (500mg three times daily) if can't take doxycycline. For pain: Ibuprofen (400mg). IMPORTANT: Complete full course even if feeling better. Watch for recurring symptoms.

conditions.name: Mononucleosis
conditions.suggestion: CAUTION: Risk of spleen rupture. Common tablets: Acetaminophen (500mg) or Ibuprofen (400mg) for fever/pain, Prednisone (20mg) if severe symptoms. WARNING: Avoid contact sports. IMPORTANT: Gradual return to activities. Rest is essential for recovery.
